content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings: not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); out of fuel; associated with fluid_system [87926] holding approximately 189.80 units of water; steam output at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); associated with fluid_system [87926] holding approximately 99.27 units of water.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87926 at position(-5.5, 19.5) – status WORKING.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87925 at position(-2.5, 19.5) – status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87938 at position(5.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87937 at position(1.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87933 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87942 at position(0.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87941 at position(1.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87944 at position(1.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87945 at position(4.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 87946 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Usage:
  - Use only supported inventory attributes when accessing or modifying inventory items.

• Pipeline Connection Failures:
  - Multiple attempts to connect the steam engine using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [84606, 84690, 84772, 84856, 84938, 85022, 85104, 85188, 85270, 85354, 85436, 85520, 85602, 85686, 85768, 85852, 85934, 86018, 86100, 86184, 86266, 86350, 86432, 86516, 86598, 86682, 86764, 86848, 86930, 87014, 87096, 87180, 87262, 87346, 87428, 87512, 87594, 87678, 87760, 87844] resulted in no candidate pipe groups found near position(-5.5, 19.5).
  - Verify that pipe groups with the correct fluid_system identifiers are installed in close proximity to the connection point before attempting connections.
